entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023
